EmailTemplate.name: Out of service Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Room Out Of Service Alert for: {!Rooms__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team ,
This Room - {!Rooms__c.Name} is Out of Service and needs some actions to be performed before it can be allocated.
Reasons for marking the room out of service:{!Rooms__c.Reasons_for_marking_out_of_service__c} Thanks
Admin
